name: Fly Drone Simulator
description:
I will improve my skills in controlling an unmanned vehicle, with an incredible convenient control system, realistic open world locations and sound effects. In this simulator you will be able to fly on steep routes between multiple check points - the main thing is not to forget about the allotted time to complete missions!

Game features:
- Many assortment of unmanned drones - a real air fleet;
- unique flight routes;
- all sorts of situations during takeoff, landing, taxiing and in flight;
- a real laser gun - incinerate if caught in its field of view;
- intuitive flight control system;
- an opportunity to show yourself, win the allotted time to complete the race;
- flexible settings system - for phones of any level.

Play everywhere in your free time, during leisure, for the convenience of the game does not require an Internet connection.

Anyone who was looking for simulators without the Internet planes online shooters. Dragons simulator fly. Play exciting missions free cool games that will allow you to have a perfect time fully enthusiastically playing.

Download the application for free, enjoy a realistic, beautifully traced city, futuristic cars and flying trains because you will be brought to the future.

Your main rival is time, because you will have to compete in a race with time!
